name: Granny

reviews: This game is pretty fun although i got bored of it, i will get granny 2 and 3, but in my opinion they should make this game free because on mobile it is free which doesn't seem fair.

There are many differences between this and the mobile version.
Here are the ones worth noting:
-This version can be modded
-This version has better quality with the shaders and stuff, but the textures aren't that much improved
-Much easier controls

I would recommend this game only if you know you will play it a lot or if you are a fan of the game (also I highly recommend getting mods for this game because the vanilla PC version isn't really that good).
If you won't be playing it that much then just play the mobile version or an emulated version for PC (you can do that on an emulator like Bluestacks).

Overall, I give the vanilla non-modded version of PC Granny a 7.5/10 (or 8.5/10 if you consider the fact that it can be modded).
